title: Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon, paper, cloth covered cardboard
Technique: printed
description: Sample book covered with cloth having marbelized print and terra-cotta back binding and label with black letters: Imported Prints. Spring and Summer 1939. Contains 376 samples: silk prints-267 flat crepes, 16 crinkle crepes, 15 twills, 14 novelties, 30 plain chiffons, 28 novelty chiffons; rayon prints- 4 novelties; woven fabrics- 2 rayon jerseys.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk, rayon, paper, cloth covered cardboard
Technique: printed. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-7.
